metadata.title: CVE-2016-3792 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: CORE/HDD/src/wlan_hdd_hostapd.c in the Qualcomm Wi-Fi driver in Androidbefore 2016-07-05 on Nexus 7 (2013) devices mishandles userspace datacopying, which allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, aka Android internal bug 27725204 and Qualcomm internal bugCR561022.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
